text: Vitaly Mikhailovich Prilukov (; 25 February 1939 â€“ 11 June 2022) was a Russian military officer and politician. He was deputy chairman of the KGB from March to August 1991 and was on the Supreme Soviet of Russia from 1990 to 1993. Prilukov died on 11 June 2022 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:KGB people Category:Russian generals Category:Politicians from Tatarstan
title: Vitaly Prilukov
